matches.version: (?-mix:<div id="content">\s+<h2>Welcome to the OrangeHRM ver ([^\s]+) Setup Wizard<\/h2>)

matches.module: (?-mix:<div id="footer"><a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank" tabindex="[^"^>]*">OrangeHRM<\/a> (Web Installation Wizard ver [^\s]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)

matches.version: (?-mix:<div id="divFooter" >\s+<span id="spanCopyright">\s+<a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank">OrangeHRM<\/a>\s+ver ([^&]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)
(?-mix:<td align="center"><a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank">OrangeHRM<\/a> ver ([^\s]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)
